properties.entry: SELECT RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, TO_CHAR(RECIPE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RECIPE_DATE, RECIPE_MODIFIED, RECIPE_STATUS, RECIPE_COUNT, RECIPE_WRITER_NO, RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME, MEM_NICKNAME FROM TB_RECIPE JOIN TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY USING (RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO) JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (RECIPE_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE RECIPE_NO = ?

SELECT RECIPE_PIC_NO, RECIPE_PIC_NAME_ORIGIN, RECIPE_PIC_NAME_UPLOAD, RECIPE_PIC_PATH, TO_CHAR(RECIPE_PIC_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') RECIPE_PIC_DATE, RECIPE_PIC_LEV, RECIPE_PIC_STATUS, REF_RNO FROM TB_RECIPE_PIC WHERE REF_RNO = ?
SELECT INGREDIENT_NO, INGREDIENT, INGREDIENT_AMOUNT, RECIPE_NO FROM TB_INGREDIENT WHERE RECIPE_NO = ?
SELECT COOK_STEPS_NO, COOK_STEPS_TITLE, COOK_STEPS_CONTENT, COOK_STEPS_LEV, RECIPE_NO FROM TB_COOK_STEPS WHERE RECIPE_NO = ?
SELECT TAG_NO, TAG_RECIPE_NO, TAG_NAME, TO_CHAR(TAG_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') TAG_DATE FROM TB_RECIPE_TAG JOIN TB_TAG USING (TAG_NO) WHERE TAG_RECIPE_NO = ?
SELECT REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REPLY_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') REPLY_DATE, REPLY_MODIFIED, REPLY_WRITER_NO, RECIPE_NO FROM TB_REPLY WHERE REPLY_STATUS = 'Y' AND RECIPE_NO = ?
SELECT RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RECIPE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON (RECIPE_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT RNUM, RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_COUNT, TITLEIMG, MEM_NICKNAME, HT_COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_COUNT, TITLEIMG, MEM_NICKNAME, HT_COUNT FROM (SELECT RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_COUNT, RECIPE_PIC_PATH||RECIPE_PIC_NAME_UPLOAD TITLEIMG, MEM_NICKNAME FROM TB_RECIPE JOIN TB_MEMBER ON(RECIPE_WRITER_NO = MEM_NO) JOIN TB_RECIPE_PIC ON(RECIPE_NO = REF_RNO) WHERE RECIPE_STATUS = 'Y' AND MEM_STATUS = 'Y' AND RECIPE_PIC_STATUS = 'Y' AND RECIPE_PIC_LEV = 1 ORDER BY RECIPE_NO DESC ) LEFT JOIN (SELECT COUNT(*) HT_COUNT, RECIPE_NO FROM TB_HT_RECIPE GROUP BY RECIPE_NO ) USING (RECIPE_NO) ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_REPLY SET REPLY_STATUS = 'N' WHERE REPLY_NO = ? AND RECIPE_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE ( RECIPE_NO, RECIPE_TITLE, RECIPE_WRITER_NO, RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RECIPE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE_PIC ( RECIPE_PIC_NO, RECIPE_PIC_NAME_ORIGIN, RECIPE_PIC_NAME_UPLOAD, RECIPE_PIC_PATH, RECIPE_PIC_LEV, REF_RNO ) VALUES ( SEQ_RECIPE_PIC.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_RECIPE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_INGREDIENT ( INGREDIENT_NO, INGREDIENT, INGREDIENT_AMOUNT, RECIPE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_INGREDIENT.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, SEQ_RECIPE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_COOK_STEPS ( COOK_STEPS_NO, COOK_STEPS_TITLE, COOK_STEPS_CONTENT, COOK_STEPS_LEV, RECIPE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_COOK_STEPS.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, SEQ_RECIPE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE_TAG ( TAG_NO, TAG_RECIPE_NO ) VALUES ( ?, SEQ_RECIPE.CURRVAL )
INSERT INTO TB_REPLY ( REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENT, REPLY_WRITER_NO, RECIPE_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ? )
INSERT INTO TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY VALUES ( SEQ_RECIPE_CATEGORY.NEXTVAL, ? )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME, NVL(CTGR_CNT.CNT, 0) AS RECIPE_CATEGORY_CNT FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY RC LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_RECIPE GROUP BY RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO) CTGR_CNT ON RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = CTGR_CNT.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY RECIPE_CATEGORY_CNT DESC) A) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

UPDATE TB_RECIPE R SET RECIPE_STATUS = 'N', RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = 0 WHERE R.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO IN (SELECT RR.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO FROM TB_RECIPE RR, TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY RC WHERE RR.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = ? AND RR.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO)
DELETE FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY WHERE RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY SET RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME = ? WHERE RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY WHERE RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY

SELECT RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME, NVL(CTGR_CNT.CNT, 0) AS RECIPE_CATEGORY_CNT FROM TB_RECIPE_CATEGORY RC LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO, COUNT(*) CNT FROM TB_RECIPE GROUP BY RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO) CTGR_CNT ON RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO = CTGR_CNT.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO WHERE RECIPE_CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY RC.RECIPE_CATEGORY_NO ASC
SELECT UN_RECIPE_NO, UN_RECIPE_TITLE FROM TB_UN_RECIPE WHERE UN_RECIPE_WRITER_NO = ?
